thread.title: Judge rules Trump can't block Twitter users

title: Judge rules Trump can't block Twitter users
text:
Judge rules Trump can't block Twitter users 3:06am EDT - 01:30
A federal judge in New York on Wednesday ruled that Trump may not legally block Twitter users because doing so violates their right to free speech under the First Amendment. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A federal judge in New York on Wednesday ruled that Trump may not legally block Twitter users because doing so violates their right to free speech under the First Amendment.
